title: How Do I Create My PBE Account?
body: I got the email for it but when I click 'create account' it just brings me to the page everyone sees when they want to go on the waiting list.

replies.body:
Are you certain the invite was for this account and not an alt you may have signed up for PBE access with a long time ago? I'd recommend trying each of your accounts by logging into them before visiting the [PBE Status Page.](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)

Let me know if this worked for you.
